bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for DC Traction Power System Field Testing and Acceptance Criteria for System Applications up to 1500 V DC Nominal
IEEE Standard for DC Traction Power System Field Testing and Acceptance Criteria for System Applications up to 1500 V DC Nominal

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines field testing and acceptance criteria for transportation system applications powered by a dc traction power system up to 1500 volts nominal.
This standard defines field testing and acceptance criteria for transportation system applications powered by a dc traction power system up to 1500 volts nominal.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
